Title: My Girl and I
Writer: Seong-gu Hwang, Kyouichi Katayama (novel), Jae-young Kwak
Actors: Tae-Hyun Cha, Hae-sook Kim, Yoon-Seok Kim, Jung-hee Moon
Plot: Beautiful student Su-Eun prevents her fellow student Su-Ho to drown in the ocean. Su-Ho however, does not know who saved him, until Su-Eun tells him after a while. The love between them ...
